titleStmt.title: The father's wholsome admonition: or, A lumping pennyworth of good counsel for bad husbands To the tune of Grim king of the ghosts. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Dea[con, J. Blare, J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "My son if you reckon to wed,".
Text printed in four columns, each headed by a woodcut.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
